entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow later this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
